description: (n-th term of Beatty sequence for (3+sqrt(3))/2) - (n-th term of Beatty sequence for sqrt(3)).
comments: It appears that a(n) is the nearest integer to (3-sqrt(3))/2 * n. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Nov 02 2006
links: Index entries for sequences related to Beatty sequences
